message.body: Hey Lauren its Alley ill probably be here at 7 still. So if you want to call me and let me know what you need done I can help :)

thanks so much! it's just putting in the top peeps on the two kilns that don't have a third one in yet. the peeps are on that shelf thing by the door under those papers. let me know if this makes any sense or you need me to call you at 7.

Hey Lauren. I know you probably won't be loading a bisque kiln for a while, but just in case you do it some time today, will you leave out my piece with the fish scales. I need to add holes to it so it can be hung
